course_title: Advanced Seminar on the Role of Partners in Global Health and Development
course_description: The goal of this course is to present students with a broad range of programs, policies, stakeholders, and organizations working to improve health and development around the world. It will use case studies and invited speakers from local and international organizations to teach students to identify and review the essential elements of global health programs and policies in diverse settings.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 6089, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 9-11a, Instructor: Team, Status: Closed
